The poster is printed at 16 x 24 in. on high quality, non-glossy photo paper. This poster is an attractive reproduction of the original poster.
input_text.Response B:
Oh my stars, have we got a treat for you! 🎩🌹✨ Introducing the Poster Magician pulling roses out of top hat surrounded by supernatural beings, 1892 - a captivating reproduction of a bygone era. 🧙‍♂️🧚‍♀️
